sentence: The Democratic ticket has two candidates: Former Mayor of Cincinnati John Cranley and former Mayor of Dayton Nan Whaley.

sentence: On the Democratic side of both races, Beck noted President Joe Biden is unlikely to endorse, even though gubernatorial candidates Nan Whaley and John Cranley – tied at 16% according to Emerson – need to chip away at the 7 in 10 undecided voters.

sentence: Longtime political analyst Howard Wilkinson, for instance, recently argued that Democratic candidates like Dayton Mayor Nan Whaley and former Cincinannti mayor John Cranley are already bashing DeWine over the issue, and they’ll likely continue to use it as a campaign cudgel for the foreseeable future.
